alert.note: Alert for Morris; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:10AM EST until February 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations up to around a tenth of an inch are expected. * WHERE...The Pennsylvania counties of Berks, Lehigh and Northampton. The New Jersey counties of Warren and Morris. * WHEN...From 6:00 AM until 4:00 PM Friday. * IMPACTS...Be prepared for slippery conditions on area roads and walkways. Postpone travel if possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The freezing rain is forecast to transition to sleet and snow before ending late on Friday afternoon. Little snow accumulation is expected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if traveling. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
